bots

Class Mind

  • java.lang.Object
    • bots.Mind
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommitBot, TestBot, ZekeBot

    public abstract class Mind
extends java.lang.Object
    The Mind Class provides a basis for other Bot AIs to be built on.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Robert
